name: cpptools
description: C/C++ IntelliSense, debugging, and code browsing.

viewsWelcome.contents: To learn more about launch.json, see [Configuring C/C++ debugging](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/launch-json-reference).

semanticTokenTypes.description: A C++ new or delete operator.

semanticTokenModifiers.description: Annotates a symbol that is declared in global scope.
Annotates a symbol that is declared in local scope.

scripts.compile: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --vscode-nls
scripts.compile-watch: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --vscode-nls --watch --info-verbosity verbose
scripts.compile-dev-watch: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && webpack --mode development --watch --info-verbosity verbose
